author: Just Jared
title: Katy Perry Announces Grammys 2017 Performance!
text:
Katy Perry is headed to the Grammys !
The 32-year-old superstar confirmed the news on her Twitter on Monday night (February 6) by sharing a message from the Recording Academy. 
‚ÄúCONFIRMED: @katyperry returns to the #GRAMMYs stage. Don‚Äôt miss her performance on Music‚Äôs Biggest Night Feb. 12 on @CBS!‚Äù the organization wrote.
Katy retweeted the message, adding in an blonde emoji raising her hand. 
According to Billboard , Katy is expected to premiere a new song called ‚ÄúChained to the Rhythm‚Äù this Friday (February 10) and it could be the song she performs. 
Katy has been nominated for 13 Grammys and has taken the stage to perform several times including in 2015, 2014, 2012 and 2011. 
Other confirmed performers include Beyonce , Adele , Bruno Mars , The Weeknd , Kelsea Ballerini and Carrie Underwood .
